programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: The Legend of Louis Mueller's Dino Beef Ribs
programme.desc: Pat visits his close friend Wayne Mueller, third-generation pitmaster of Louis Mueller's BBQ, to learn the ins and outs of his famous dino beef ribs.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat visits Edgar Victoria, known for bringing the street foods of Mexico City to Nashville, to do some live fire cooking out in nature as they prepare one of his favorite dishes - skirt steak tlayuda.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat travels to the Emerald Coast of Destin, Florida, to join his friend Adam Evans on a spearfishing adventure, sourcing fresh fish to cook over live fire.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: Hickory Smoked Virginia Ham & Mint Juleps
programme.desc: Pat Martin gets a history lesson on the origin of American barbecue from "The Professor" Tuffy Stone.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat Martin heads to the Cherokee National Forest for a day of fly fishing with an old friend, and to cook up their fresh catch over the campfire.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat Martin travels to Gainesboro, Tennessee to visit a free-range hog farm, learn about their operations, and grill up a less desired, but no less delicious, cut of hog - pork steaks.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: The Legend of Louis Mueller's Dino Beef Ribs
programme.desc: Pat visits his close friend Wayne Mueller, third-generation pitmaster of Louis Mueller's BBQ, to learn the ins and outs of his famous dino beef ribs.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat visits Edgar Victoria, known for bringing the street foods of Mexico City to Nashville, to do some live fire cooking out in nature as they prepare one of his favorite dishes - skirt steak tlayuda.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern prepares the ultimate shore lunch of fried walleye filets, served with a tangy homemade tartar sauce, coleslaw, and crispy fried potatoes. Next, chef grills bone-in elk chops with a simple mustard glaze over hardwood charcoal.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Creamy Clam Chowder and Mussels in Spicy Tomato Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern demystifies cooking clams, mussels and oysters.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern grills his favorite tender cuts of venison and serves it with coal-roasted sweet potatoes. Then, he cooks a hearty pot of classic Louisiana gumbo using wild duck and grills crispy-skinned duck breast for the topping.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern shares his favorite way to prepare wild turkey breast, pan-fried over an open fire. Served with cheese sauce and jalapeno-bacon wild rice. Then, cooks a simple meal of seared salmon and a side of crispy potatoes and onions.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Zimmern cooks his version of Peking-style goose. Next, Chef Zimmern cooks a meal of striped bass.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern reimagines the Hawaiian plate lunch with a hand chopped venison burger topped with homemade gravy and a fried egg, jumbo grilled shrimp, a humble macaroni salad and a heaping scoop of white rice.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Chicken Fried Deer and Creole Halibut
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern prepares chicken fried axis deer. Next, Chef Zimmern poaches halibut in tomato roux.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Bison Tomahawk Chop with Italian-style Eggplant and Panzanella
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern shares a simple trick for getting the most out Bison tomahawk chops.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern goes primal with two antelope dishes: a Greek-style whole leg roasted over the open fire with a lemony avgolemono sauce and crispy potatoes, and a simple antelope tenderloin carpaccio served with roasted tomatoes and parmesan.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern prepares the ultimate shore lunch of fried walleye filets, served with a tangy homemade tartar sauce, coleslaw, and crispy fried potatoes. Next, chef grills bone-in elk chops with a simple mustard glaze over hardwood charcoal.

programme.sub-title: Bison Tomahawk Chop with Italian-style Eggplant and Panzanella
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern shares a simple trick for getting the most out Bison tomahawk chops.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Braised Pigeon with Homemade Herb Gnocchi
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern cooks braised squab with olives and vinegar, a perfect meal for a fall evening.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: The Legend of Louis Mueller's Dino Beef Ribs
programme.desc: Pat visits his close friend Wayne Mueller, third-generation pitmaster of Louis Mueller's BBQ, to learn the ins and outs of his famous dino beef ribs.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat visits Edgar Victoria, known for bringing the street foods of Mexico City to Nashville, to do some live fire cooking out in nature as they prepare one of his favorite dishes - skirt steak tlayuda.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat travels to the Emerald Coast of Destin, Florida, to join his friend Adam Evans on a spearfishing adventure, sourcing fresh fish to cook over live fire.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: South Carolina Peach-Glazed Ribs with Rice Middlins
programme.desc: When Pat's friends and fellow barbecue chefs, Bryan Furman and Dr. Howard Conyers, come to town, the guys dig deep into the tricks and traditions of one of Bryan's specialties: pork ribs.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: Red Curry Braised Pork with Mustard Greens
programme.desc: Pat Martin is in the frozen tundra of Minnesota to visit his new friend, Chef Yia Vang. They brave the cold and break nearly-frozen ground to barbecue a pig's head in the earth.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat Martin links up with his pal, Bill Darsinos, to enjoy a tradition from the heart of Bill's Greek culture when they cook a whole lamb on a spit roast.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat Martin travels to a picturesque cattle farm in California's Santa Maria Valley, to hear firsthand from a young pitmaster who has uncovered the secrets of real Santa Maria barbecue.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: Pit-Cooked Chicken with Alabama White Sauce
programme.desc: Pat Martin travels to Decatur, Alabama to visit a storied institution of barbecue - Big Bob Gibson's. There, he learns the ins, the outs, and the history of a regional delicacy: pit-cooked chicken with Alabama white sauce.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: Bluefin Tuna Collars with Chili Pickle Relish
programme.desc: Pat Martin visits chef Adam Perry Lang in Los Angeles, where the pair cook a prized catch castoff cut - Bluefin Tuna collars.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat Martin teams up with fellow pitmasters to showcase the rugged and nuanced tradition of whole-hog cooking, West Tennessee-style.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings the heat when it comes to making perfect pork dishes including a root beer glazed pork banh mi, chorizo fried rice, Filipino sausage stuffed long hot peppers, and round it all out with a spicy grilled pineapple sundae.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Summertime seasonal fruit pampers your tastebuds. Chef Dale grills blistered grapes with ham wrapped Trout, Peaches with smoked Pork Chops, Watermelon with halloumi, and Chargrilled Cherries with chocolate Mousse.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.sub-title: A Festive & Flavorful Christmas in July
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde grills smoked ham and pineapple praline sliders, sweet potatoes with soy maple bacon, eggplant with labneh and cranberries, a holiday mezze plate and a grilled coquito cocktail.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: It's Pizza Time! Chef Dale Talde grills up amazing pizzas for every palate including a Detroit Style Pie, a Cheddar Naan Pie with a Spiced Chick Peas & Potatoes, and gives your childhood favorite French Bread Pizza a much needed upgrade.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde is throwin' down a pizza spread like never before with his Chicago-style tavern pie with sausage & onion, a grilled pizza pocket with pepperoni & cheese, chicken wings a la pizzaiola, and a zesty grilled caesar salad to finish it off.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Don't sleep on grilled chicken, especially if it's Chef Dale night to cook! He's serving up Japanese style yakitori three ways, from spicy to sweet to zesty, with crispy rice, and of course he adds his own flair to these delicious skewered snacks.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Dale's turning up the heat! Carolina Reaper wings hotter than your ex, sweet-chili NY strip steak, smoky grilled chipotle Texas toast, and ancho-gochujang pineapple skillet cake for dessert. Bring some water!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale is flipping burgers into art - gooey mac & cheese burgers, fancy French patties topped with melty bucheron cheese, crispy parm-truffle fries, and peanut butter fudge ice cream sandwiches. Get hungry.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Ribs are a lifestyle, and Chef Dale's living it up with smoky beef shorties in tangy red wine glaze, Miami-style pork ribs dripping in bacon-guava BBQ, spicy baked beans, and killer key lime caramel cones. Grab some napkins!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde is back to level up his steak game by grilling up a NY strip steak with roasted onions & poblanos, short ribs with chili paste and horseradish, and a grilled chateaubriand with charred broccolini. Steak your claim on these dishes!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde is throwin' down a pizza spread like never before with his Chicago-style tavern pie with sausage & onion, a grilled pizza pocket with pepperoni & cheese, chicken wings a la pizzaiola, and a zesty grilled caesar salad to finish it off.
